title: Basic Course for Obstetric and Emergency Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and fundamental obstetrics-related knowledge
context.additional_context: Cultivating obstetric and emergency response capabilities through smartphone-centered simulation-based learning in limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain step-by-step seven core skills (e.g., umbilical cord prolapse response, hemorrhage management) required in obstetric and emergency situations.
Learners can apply role distribution and communication protocols with 80% or higher accuracy through teamwork scenario simulations.
Learners can achieve 85+ points on a four-option multiple-choice formative assessment after completing virtual simulation modules in an LMS.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
